## strNoSuffix() function

确保字符串没有特定后缀，有则删除

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function strNoSuffix(s: string, suffix: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  s | string | 字符串 |
|  suffix | string | 后缀 |

**Returns:**

string

确保移除后缀的字符串
